mapper.sql: DP_ID, DP_NAME, DP_SCRIPTID, DP_STARTDATE, DP_ENDDATE, DP_START, DP_TRANSINT, DP_TRANSKEEP, DP_DATAASSIGN, DP_MAXCALLTIMES, DP_JUMPSCRIPT, DP_DATACOUNT, DP_NOTASSIGNCOUNT, DP_ANSWERDICT, DP_NOANSWERDICT, DP_ISCTICONTROL, DP_RULE1, DP_RULE2, DP_RULE3, DP_RULE4, DP_RULE5, DP_RULE6, DP_RULE7, DP_STARTTIME, DP_ENDTIME, DP_CANIMPORT, DP_ISLIMIT, DP_POOLTYPE, DP_GIVEUPPOOL, DP_APPROVAL, DP_INCALLTRANIN, DP_Q_ID,
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NAG_DATAPOOL ( DP_ID , DP_NAME , DP_SCRIPTID , DP_STARTDATE , DP_ENDDATE , DP_START , DP_TRANSINT , DP_TRANSKEEP , DP_DATAASSIGN , DP_MAXCALLTIMES , DP_JUMPSCRIPT , DP_DATACOUNT , DP_NOTASSIGNCOUNT , DP_ANSWERDICT , DP_NOANSWERDICT , DP_ISCTICONTROL , DP_RULE1 , DP_RULE2 , DP_RULE3 , DP_RULE4 , DP_RULE5 , DP_RULE6 , DP_RULE7 , DP_STARTTIME , DP_ENDTIME , DP_CANIMPORT , DP_ISLIMIT , DP_POOLTYPE , DP_GIVEUPPOOL , DP_APPROVAL , DP_INCALLTRANIN , DP_Q_ID ) VALUES ( #{dpId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpScriptid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpStartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dpEnddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dpStart,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpTransint,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpTranskeep,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpDataassign,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpMaxcalltimes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpJumpscript,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpDatacount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpNotassigncount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpAnswerdict,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpNoanswerdict,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpIscticontrol,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule3,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule4,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule5,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule6,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpRule7,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dpEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dpCanimport,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpIslimit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpPooltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpGiveuppool,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpApproval,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpIncalltranin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dpQId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select: SELECT DP_ID as "dpId" , DP_NAME as "dpName" , DP_SCRIPTID as "dpScriptid" , DP_STARTDATE as "dpStartdate" , DP_ENDDATE as "dpEnddate" , DP_START as "dpStart" , DP_TRANSINT as "dpTransint" , DP_TRANSKEEP as "dpTranskeep" , DP_DATAASSIGN as "dpDataassign" , DP_MAXCALLTIMES as "dpMaxcalltimes" , DP_JUMPSCRIPT as "dpJumpscript" , DP_DATACOUNT as "dpDatacount" , DP_NOTASSIGNCOUNT as "dpNotassigncount" , DP_ANSWERDICT as "dpAnswerdict" , DP_NOANSWERDICT as "dpNoanswerdict" , DP_ISCTICONTROL as "dpIscticontrol" , DP_RULE1 as "dpRule1" , DP_RULE2 as "dpRule2" , DP_RULE3 as "dpRule3" , DP_RULE4 as "dpRule4" , DP_RULE5 as "dpRule5" , DP_RULE6 as "dpRule6" , DP_RULE7 as "dpRule7" , DP_STARTTIME as "dpStarttime" , DP_ENDTIME as "dpEndtime" , DP_CANIMPORT as "dpCanimport" , DP_ISLIMIT as "dpIslimit" , DP_POOLTYPE as "dpPooltype" , DP_GIVEUPPOOL as "dpGiveuppool" , DP_APPROVAL as "dpApproval" , DP_INCALLTRANIN as "dpIncalltranin" , DP_Q_ID as "dpQId" FROM NAG_DATAPOOL WHERE DP_ID=#{dpId}
SELECT Auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE Table_Schema='${dbName}' AND table_name = 'NAG_DATAPOOL'
